name: Santa's Reindeer Run
description:
'Twas the Night before Christmas; Santa sat in the sleigh.
With a crack of a whip, he would be on his way.
But the elves were careless and the buckles weren't tight.
The reindeer unhitched and flew out of sight!
Help Santa and Dasher catch up with their friends
And deliver the presents before Christmas Eve ends!

In Santa's Reindeer Run you help Santa collect presents to deliver. Without his full reindeer team, the sleigh is too heavy to stay in the air for long. Touch the screen to make the sleigh dive and gain speed, then use the hills to get airborne! Unlocking reindeer increases the number of presents Santa can haul and also increases the speed of the sleigh. Collecting candy canes activates Sugar Rush mode for an additional burst of speed. Santa will need that extra power because he has to deliver the presents before morning or it's game over!
